title: 223: Outer Order, Inner Calm with Gretchen Rubin
itunes:title: 223: Outer Order, Inner Calm with Gretchen Rubin
description:
Why is it so hard for some of us to keep our spaces clean? Why do some of us keep accumulating things? I sit with author Gretchen Rubin to discuss her hacks for a successful and sustainable organized living space. If you’ve been calling in a cleaner home, this is for you.

Check out her book “Outer Order, Inner Calm”, out now!
